title: FinchPay
author: FinchPay
created_time: October 20, 2022, 01:59:16 PMLast edit: December 10, 2023, 11:16:52 PM by FinchPay
content: FinchPay is a crypto on-ramp and off-ramp service, which lets users purchase and sell cryptocurrencies with fiat currencies. Users can choose between the following payment methods: Visa and MasterCard bank card and multiple alternative payment methods for different GEOs. The list of crypto assets for purchase and sale is always expanding, and now we support all main cryptocurrencies, such as BTC, ETH, USDT etc. FinchPay provides full disclosure on the exchange rates and the service fee, making the terms of transactions fully transparent.FinchPay is a flagship product by Vilnius-based UAB Finch Technologies. The company is registered as a Virtual Asset Service Provider in accordance with Lithuanian and EU regulations. The customer registration and AML/KYC verification is a one-time procedure which only takes a few minutes. The global FinchPay platform is available in more than 100 countries.For business clients, FinchPay offers B2B and B2B2C solutions and provides their partners with API for integration of their gateway into various crypto and financial products. 24/7 customer support service and refined transaction flow ensure optimal user experience even for first-timers. Both retail and corporate clients will enjoy the reliability, convenience, and simplicity of FinchPay.Customers about usTrustpilot: https://uk.trustpilot.com/review/finchpay.ioHow to reach us?FinchPay official website: https://finchpay.ioEmail: support@finchpay.ioLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/finchpay/

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: FinchPay on October 20, 2022, 01:59:16 PMUsers can choose between the following payment methods: Visa and MasterCard bank cards, SEPA transfers, GPay, and ApplePay. Not sure if your team forgot to turn it on or not, but the last one didn't even appear on the checkout page!Quote from: FinchPay on October 20, 2022, 01:59:16 PMmaking the terms of transactions fully transparent.Speaking of transparency, it'd be nice to see something that could back up those impressive stats [archived]...Quote from: FinchPay on October 20, 2022, 01:59:16 PMoffering purchases with 65+ local currencies in addition to the US dollar and Euro.Is the former also coming soon or it's there and I'm just missing them somehow?Btw, you might want to consider lowering the minimum limit!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: it seems that your platform is not finished yet, you need to make additional corrections. For example, limit the displayed bitcoin amount to only 8 decimal places (now 16).I would like to see that you are connected, therefore checked by a third-party service in which we have a little more confidence. Best Change for example. Trust pilot feedback is not so reliable, it can be easily faked. especially if there are only 14 reviews.where we can see the fee structure, I see that the percentage changes depending on the amount of exchange.

comments.author: Trinityior
comments.body: Hey guysHope to see more coins in your service.. I ve already used FinchPay for buying btc. It was delivered on time without any problems ) Highly recommend to anyone

comments.author: FinchPay
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on October 25, 2022, 11:36:46 AMQuote from: FinchPay on October 20, 2022, 01:59:16 PMUsers can choose between the following payment methods: Visa and MasterCard bank cards, SEPA transfers, GPay, and ApplePay. Not sure if your team forgot to turn it on or not, but the last one didn't even appear on the checkout page!Quote from: FinchPay on October 20, 2022, 01:59:16 PMmaking the terms of transactions fully transparent.Speaking of transparency, it'd be nice to see something that could back up those impressive stats [archived]...Quote from: FinchPay on October 20, 2022, 01:59:16 PMoffering purchases with 65+ local currencies in addition to the US dollar and Euro.Is the former also coming soon or it's there and I'm just missing them somehow?Btw, you might want to consider lowering the minimum limit!Thank you for your interest in our project.Local currencies and GPay/ApplePay payments methods will be available soon. Stay tuned for updates!Regarding statistics, unfortunately, we cannot disclose detailed information about ongoing transactions. Nevertheless, our team will definitely return to the issue of transparency of this data and think about how to improve this point

comments.body: A pretty smooth purchase procedure. As a total beginner in crypto, I feel more secure using the regulated service provider, it appears nice and easy with finch pay

comments.author: ligebac
comments.body: Hey! Do you perform manual or automatic exchanges?

comments.body: Quote from: ligebac on March 03, 2023, 11:29:18 AMHey! Do you perform manual or automatic exchanges?Hello! All processing steps are automatic.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I would never trust or recommend that anyone use a service that creates alt accounts and 1-post shills that post fake reviews, questions, and praises for the site and its team. It's a cheap marketing attempt to bring some hype where there isn't one. I doubt that any genuine Bitcointalk user tried this exchange.

comments.author: FinchPay
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on March 05, 2023, 09:11:41 AMI would never trust or recommend that anyone use a service that creates alt accounts and 1-post shills that post fake reviews, questions, and praises for the site and its team. It's a cheap marketing attempt to bring some hype where there isn't one. I doubt that any genuine Bitcointalk user tried this exchange. Hello! We've checked the info on the accounts you mentioned. They don't seem to be fake, especially the comments that our users left. Thank you for your attention to FinchPay. You can try the service yourself and if it disappoints you then we'll satisfy your complaint.Have a good day,FinchPay
